series_description: This series documents the control of access to specific buildings, departments, rooms or areas. This series may include, but is not limited to: access lists, sign-in sheets, logs, registers, instruction books or emergency contact records. Includes both paper and electronic records.

This series documents planning preparation for, response to, and recovery from any event that places an agency in an than-normal status. This series may include, but is not limited to: disaster plan, Continuity of Operations Plan (COOP), emergency action plan, emergency contacts, telephone and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the process of and expenses for the recovery from a Stateor Federally-declared disaster. This series may include, but is not limited to: damage reports, reports, expense records, a copy of all activated response plans, and supporting documentation.
This series documents the movement of equipment into and of facilities when control is required for security purposes. series may include, but is not limited to: logs and lists.
This series documents fire and emergency evacuation procedures for the building, office or department. This series may include, but is not limited to: evacuation plans.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents routine fire extinguisher inspections. This series may include, but is not limited to: fire extinguisher tags or sheets that document inspections.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the completion and results of fire safety inspections, including any follow-up actions taken. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspection reports and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the assigment of duties, and use or control of building/department guards or security monitors (excluding personnel and payroll activities). This series may include, but is not limited to: rosters, procedural records, and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the identification process for individuals with access to buildings, departments, room or areas. This series may include, but is not limited to: issue records, back-up photos, and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the duties of and actions taken by the agency, building, or department safety officer. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, logs and supporting documentation produced, maintained or collected by the safety officer.

series_title: Security and Surveillance Tapes: Not Used as Evidence
series_description: This series documents the surveillance and monitoring of a building or area for security purposes. This series may but is not limited to: audio or video recordings.
